ooC: Sorry for not noticing that Gesper wasn't at the Autobot base 
anymore, but since I forgot about him the first time, I figured that 
Pacifix would forget about him for a bit. Then when it isn't soo 
hectic, he can do something about it.

If this post is void, i'll find out when I read the rest of the 
posts.

-- Anachronox --

Anachronox jumps up, and quickly strides across the ship. He hefts 
Belthassan gently, and turns to face Melchana, "Melchana, lead that 
way, I won't allow Belthassan to lose functionality while I can 
prevent it." He looks around, but doesn't know where to go, so he 
just waits for Melchana.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Belthassan is at sea, holding Gesper. The Hellgate is right above 
them 
> but they need help fast to get out of the water.
> 
> Melchana looks around, trying to find some kind of vine. She sees 
the 
> crane, but it is not long enough to get them.
> 
> Melchana: AAAAAARGHH! Stupid technological ship! You can't find a 
vine 
> when you need one!
> 
> Jetstorm is panicked. He was not prepared for this.
> 
> Jetstorm: Melchana! Why don't you do something?
> 
> Melchana: And why are you not doing anything, Nutbrain?
> 
> Daemos: Jetstorm, for the Matrix's sake! You're a hawk! Fly down 
there 
> and pick them up!
> 
> Jetstorm: Y... Yeah... That's right... I can fly...
> 
> He transforms to hawk mode and flies down.
> 
> Jetstorm: Bel! Hold on to my talons!
> 
> Belthassan: Finally! (He spits some water out) It was time one of 
you 
> acted!
> 
> The waves were strong and violent. Belthassan had to use great 
stamina 
> to keep his head out. He made a sweep with his hand to grab the 
talon, 
> but missed it widely. Still holding his brother, he moved his legs 
and 
> swam nearer. The second pass succeeded, and Jetstorm used his 
large 
> wings to get back and into the ship.
> 
> As soon as they were inside, Daemos closed the doors.
> 
> Melchana: Anachronox, help me get them to regenerative units! It 
won't 
> get them to full health, but it will at least get them back in 
some 
> sort of shape!
